com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval

Interface IEvaluationContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AST2BOpContext, AST2BOpUpdateContext

    public interface IEvaluationContext
    Interface providing access to various things of interest when preparing and evaluating a query or update operation.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Detail

      • getSolutionSetStats

        ISolutionSetStats getSolutionSetStats()
        Some summary statistics about the exogenous solution sets. These are computed by AST2BOpUtility.convert(AST2BOpContext, IBindingSet[]) before it begins to run the IASTOptimizers.

      • getStaticAnalysisStats

        StaticAnalysisStats getStaticAnalysisStats()
        Summary statistics for the static analysis phase.

      • getTimestamp

        long getTimestamp()
        The timestamp or transaction identifier associated with the view.

      • isCluster

        boolean isCluster()
        Return true if we are running on a cluster.

      • isQuads

        boolean isQuads()
        Return true iff the target AbstractTripleStore is in quads mode.

      • isSIDs

        boolean isSIDs()
        Return true iff the target AbstractTripleStore is in SIDS mode.

      • isTriples

        boolean isTriples()
        Return true iff the target AbstractTripleStore is in triples mode.

        String getNamespace()
        Return the namespace of the AbstractTripleStore.

        String getSPONamespace()
        Return the namespace of the SPORelation.

        String getLexiconNamespace()
        Return the namespace of the LexiconRelation.

      • getBOpContext

        BOpContextBase getBOpContext()
        Return the context for evaluation of IValueExpressions during query optimization.
        Returns:
        The context that can be used to resolve the ILexiconConfiguration and LexiconRelation for evaluation if IValueExpressions during query optimization. (During query evaluation this information is passed into the pipeline operators by the ContextBindingSet.)
        See Also:
        BLZG-1372

      • getLexiconReadTimestamp

        long getLexiconReadTimestamp()
        Return the timestamp which will be used to read on the lexicon.

        Note: This uses the timestamp of the triple store view unless this is a read/write transaction, in which case we need to use the last commit point in order to see any writes which it may have performed (lexicon writes are always unisolated).

      • getAbstractTripleStore

        AbstractTripleStore getAbstractTripleStore()
        Return the database.

      • getSolutionSetManager

        ISolutionSetManager getSolutionSetManager()
        Return the manager for named solution sets (experimental feature).
        Returns:
        The manager -or- null.

      • getDescribeCache

        IDescribeCache getDescribeCache()
        Return the cache for described resources (experimental feature).
        Returns:
        The cache -or- null.
        See Also:
        QueryHints.DESCRIBE_CACHE

      • getSolutionSetStats

        ISolutionSetStats getSolutionSetStats(String name)
        Resolve the pre-existing named solution set returning its ISolutionSetStats.
        Parameters:
        localName - The local name of the named solution set.
        Returns:
        The ISolutionSetStats
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the named solution set can not be found.

      • getGloballyScopedVariables

        Set<IVariable<?>> getGloballyScopedVariables()
        Returns all the variables with a global scope. This basically serves the purpose of identifying variables that are injected through Sesame's Operation.setBinding() interface. Guaranteed to be not null.
        Returns:
